University IT support and services are available to you, no matter where you are located. If you need help telecommuting, check out our Work Anywhere site.

More News 
  





Stanford Slack
Last Call For Slack Workspace Migrations




Jamie C. Tsui




UIT Client Experience and Solutions








Brendan Lien




UIT Client Experience and Solutions





October 4, 2022
Going forward, workspaces can no longer be migrated into the Slak grid. The final migration is scheduled for Dec. 15, 2022.



Learn more about Last Call For Slack Workspace Migrations

 




Stanford Slack
If You’re on These Versions, Update to Continue Using Slack




Jamie C. Tsui




UIT Client Experience and Solutions





August 12, 2022
Slack updates its system requirements twice a year. Learn which apps, browsers, and operating systems will soon no longer be supported starting September 2022.



Learn more about If You’re on These Versions, Update to Continue Using Slack

 




Stanford Slack
New Visual Experience Boosts Collaboration in Slack Huddles




Brad Immanuel




UIT Client Experience and Solutions








Jamie C. Tsui




UIT Client Experience and Solutions





July 15, 2022
Slack has enhanced the Huddles experience to offer video, multi-user screen sharing, and more — all exclusively within the Slack app.



Learn more about New Visual Experience Boosts Collaboration in Slack Huddles
